textBox.richText: To all the people that recommended San Francisco’s Seafood Chowder in Sourdough - THANKYOU! Brilliant. Nuff said. Today marked Felicity’s arrival to the United States (new highlight of the trip). After a week of flying solo I finally have a travel companion and I’m absolutely over the moon. The added security brought about by the recent terrorist arrests meant that Fliss had to jump through a few more hoops than usual but other than that she’s arrived safe and sound in fantastic San Francisco. Apart from a pretty stiff westerly wind it was another glorious day. After a quick stroll around the Fisherman’s Wharf we headed out on a quick cruise around the bay. Don’t forget to drop by and see the new additions to San Fran Pics. WWDC has now concluded and with that I can quite confidently say that nerd entries will now desist. In turn hopefully this marks the beginning of interesting blog entries and entertaining photos!
